mapper.select: SELECT recruitment_info.recruitment_id , recruitment_info.job_title , recruitment_info.city , recruitment_info.min_salary , recruitment_info.max_salary , recruitment_info.byword FROM recruitment_info, marked_recruitment_info WHERE recruitment_info.recruitment_id = marked_recruitment_info.recruitment_id AND recruitment_info.min_salary >= #{minSalary} AND recruitment_info.max_salary <= #{maxSalary} AND (recruitment_info.job_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryInfo}, '%') OR recruitment_info.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryInfo}, '%'))
